price: 121. Nabiyow ama korosuy Yallih inkittinaane nummayse waytak isin edde tanin caalat kee elle tanin gital taamita, diggah nanu ninni gitaay ninni diinil diggi innaamal taamitennok keenik ixxic.
arabic: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqul lilladhīna lā yu'minūna iʿ'malū ʿalā makānatikum innā ʿāmilūna
